item.description:
We will have our July Pug Meetup on Sunday, July 26th from 11am to 1pm. I am hoping that the yard work we have planned for our outdoor play yard will be complete by then and we'll be able to have a pool party for the puggies. I'll let you know more about that as the day approaches.

Just a reminder that we require proof of updated vaccines for the rabies, distemper and bordatella. If you'd like to schedule a grooming for after the meet up please let us know.

Any questions or suggestions, please do not hesitate to contact us!
item.name: July Meet Up - Pool Party!!!???
